input.description: access key [Optional] The AWS access key.
secret key [Optional] The AWS secret access key.

session token [Optional] : The AWS session token which is generally created for temporary access to users for role based authorization.
Please Note: The temporary access key , secret key and session token to be generated by the user to provide in adapter request.
Please refer below AWS docs for more details
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_credentials_temp_request.html
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/cli/latest/reference/sts/assume-role.html
region [Optional] The region to communicate with.

bundles set [Optional]
Set of bundle tasks.
<bundles-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <bundle-id></bundle-id> </item> </bundles-set>

filter set [Optional]
The details of the filter as per which you want to retrieve the bundle tasks.
<filter-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <name>state</name> <value-set> <!--Zero or more repetition--> <item> <value>pending</value> </item> </value-set> </item> </filter-set>
The following are the available filters.
bundle-id (Type: String) The ID of the bundle task.
error-code (Type: String) If the task failed, the error code returned.
error-message (Type: String) If the task failed, the error message returned.
instance-id (Type: String) The ID of the instance.
progress The level of task completion, as a percentage (for example, 20%).
s3-bucket (Type: String) The Amazon S3 bucket to store the AMI.
s3-prefix (Type: String) The beginning of the AMI name.
start-time The time the task started (for example, 2013-09-15T17:15:20.000Z).
state (Type: String) The state of the task Valid Values: pending | waiting-for-shutdown | bundling | storing | cancelling | complete | failed
update-time The time of the most recent update for the task.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <request-data> <amazon-ec2-rest-request> <xsl:if test="string-length('${access key}')>0"> <access-key>${access key}</access-key> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${secret key}')>0"> <secret-key>${secret key}</secret-key> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${session token}')>0 and string-length('${secret key}')>0 and string-length('${access key}')>0"> <session-token>${session token}</session-token> </xsl:if> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">describe-bundle-tasks</xsl:text> </operation-name> <xsl:if test="string-length('${region}')>0"> <region>${region}</region> </xsl:if> <parameters>${bundles set}${filters}</parameters> </amazon-ec2-rest-request> </request-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
